title: Bering Land Bridge National Preserve: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education        BELA offers a wide range of classroom and field opportunities for students and teachers NPS Photo   Â    Discover the many ways to explore Bering Land Bridge National Preserve from your classroom or from your home! A variety of fun activities and resources are offered for schools, education groups, students and teachers alike. School visits, education kits, lesson plans, Junior Ranger books, and more!     If you would like to bring a ranger to your classroom or to discuss additional program options, contact us at 1-800-471-2352 or e-mail us.
